Parameters: int: @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the reliable write transaction was executed successfully
onReliableWriteCompleted(android.bluetoo.Description: Callback invoked when a reliable write transaction has been completed.
onReliableWriteCompleted(android.bluetoo.FullName: public void onReliableWriteCompleted (BluetoothGatt gatt, int status)

Parameters: BluetoothGattCharacteristic: Characteristic that was written to the associated remote device.
int: The result of the write operation @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the operation succeeds.
onCharacteristicWrite(android.bluetooth..Description: Callback indicating the result of a characteristic write operation. If this callback is invoked while a reliable write transaction is in progress, the value of the characteristic represents the value reported by the remote device. An application should compare this value to the desired value to be written. If the values don't match, the application must abort the reliable write transaction.
onCharacteristicWrite(android.bluetooth..FullName: public void onCharacteristicWrite (BluetoothGatt gatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, int status)

Parameters: int: the transmitter PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@.
int: the receiver PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@.
int: Status of the PHY update operation. @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the operation succeeds.
onPhyUpdate(android.bluetooth.BluetoothG.Description: Callback triggered as result of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#setPreferredPhy_E@, or as a result of remote device changing the PHY.

Parameters: int: @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the MTU has been changed successfully
onMtuChanged(android.bluetooth.Bluetooth.Description: Callback indicating the MTU for a given device connection has changed. This callback is triggered in response to the @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#requestMtu_E@ function, or in response to a connection event.

Parameters: int: The RSSI value for the remote device

Parameters: int: the transmitter PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@.
int: the receiver PHY in use. One of @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_1M_E@, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_2M_E@, and @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#PHY_LE_CODED_E@.

Parameters: int: Status of the connect or disconnect operation. @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#GATT_SUCCESS_E@ if the operation succeeds.
